Text:
I must add... The Physical Bluray video playback quality is utter shit.... so if you download this and/or take a look at the screenshots.... it's not my encoding that is made it look "bad"... it's actually the way the bluray is.

I didn't want to upload this without trying other encoding options... But after doing up several encodes... higher bitrates and different settings.... It didn't improve anything. So this is about as good as it gets short of buying the bluray itself.

Sorry...
